mapper.select: SELECT REPOSITORY_UUID AS repositoryUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, REPOSITORY_CODE AS repositoryCode, REPOSITORY_NAME AS repositoryName, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, USE_YN AS useYn, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM ST_REPOSITORY

SELECT REPOSITORY_UUID AS repositoryUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, REPOSITORY_CODE AS repositoryCode, REPOSITORY_NAME AS repositoryName, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, USE_YN AS useYn, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM ST_REPOSITORY WHERE REPOSITORY_UUID = #{repositoryUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_REPOSITORY SET STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, REPOSITORY_CODE = #{repositoryCode}, REPOSITORY_NAME = #{repositoryName}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE REPOSITORY_UUID = #{repositoryUuid}

INSERT INTO ST_REPOSITORY ( REPOSITORY_UUID, STATUS_UUID, REPOSITORY_CODE, REPOSITORY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, USE_YN, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{repositoryUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{repositoryCode}, #{repositoryName}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{useYn}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
